Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.14.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.14.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Navippayuttādi
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Navippayuttādi
430.
3407Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… .
3408Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…pe…  nonatthipaccayā…  novigatapaccayā.
<< Najhānādiup10.14.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
